events.name: Kotlin Introduction Workshop (PAID)
events.description: PLEASE NOTE THIS IS PAID EVENT(Just 7$)! YOU NEED TO BUY TICKETS AT: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/kotlin-introduction-workshop-tickets-35750284062  Kotlin is the modern programming language that is now officially supported by Google for Android development. And it also good for web and backend developers too.  In this 2 hour workshop, we’ll learn more about Kotlin. You can start your programming career or just learn the new language together with us proficient Kotlin developers with more than two years experience.  Session agenda: • Intro and Welcome (10 minutes) • Kotlin syntax (15 minutes) • Kotlin first application (15 minutes) • Hands-on: let’s build our first console application with Kotlin (45 minutes) • Break (15 minutes) • Hands-on: let’s build our first Android application with Kotlin (1 hour) • Wrapup (10 minutes) Pre-requisites: A laptop that you should bring; charged. Android Studio 3.0 beta installed. Java Development Kit installed. Do not forget to get your ticket (printed or electronic)
events.location: LEVEL3, Mapletree Business City #03-22, 20 Pasir Panjang Road (East Wing), Singapore
